```{r}
pacman::p_load(jsonlite, tidyverse, SmartEDA, tidygraph, ggraph
)
```

```{r}
data <- fromJSON("MC1/data/MC1_graph.json")
glimpse(data)
```

```{r}
mc1_nodes_raw <- as_tibble(data$nodes)
glimpse(mc1_nodes_raw)
```

```{r}
mc1_links_raw <- as_tibble(data$links)
glimpse(mc1_links_raw)
```

```{r}
mc1_nodes_lite <- mc1_nodes_raw %>% select(id, `Node Type`)
(mc1_nodes_lite$`Node Type`) %>% unique()
```

```{r}
mc1_links_lite <- mc1_links_raw %>% select(`Edge Type`, source, target, key)
(mc1_links_lite$`Edge Type`) %>% unique()
```
